United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: If Rory McIlroy wins the Masters, it will mean the United States Open Champion and the Masters champion will both be from Northern Ireland.
snippet: If Rory McIlroy wins the Masters, it will mean the United States Open Champion and the Masters champion will both be from Northern Ireland.
